non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Erection of a basement and seven storey building and associated works in connection with the use of the basement as 35 parking spaces, the ground floor as 2 commercial units (755m2 of Class A1, A2, A3 or B1 accommodation), 10 motorcycle spaces plus cycle parking, and the upper floors as 80 residential units (8 x 3 bed, 48 x 2 bed and 24 x 1 bed units) - revised application 25/11/02.
